name: Appofa Development Container
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; apt-get update; apt-get install -y postgresql postgresql-contrib postgresql-client nginx; npm install -g pm2; service postgresql start; su - postgres -c "psql -c \"ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD '''password''';\""; if ! su - postgres -c "psql -tc \"SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='newsapp'\"" | grep -q 1; then su - postgres -c "psql -c \"CREATE DATABASE newsapp;\""; fi; npm install; if [ ! -f .env ]; then cp .env.example .env; fi'
